concise_definition: n. (人名) 利萨（女性名，Liza 的变体）

definitions.explanation_en: A feminine given name, often a shortened form of Elizabeth or Lizabeth, used in various cultures as a personal identifier.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个女性名，通常是 Elizabeth 或 Lizabeth 的缩写形式，用于多种文化中作为个人称呼。
definitions.example_en: Liza joined the team last month and has already made a strong impression.
definitions.example_cn: 莉莎上个月加入团队，已经留下了深刻的印象。
